quotes.quote: It is one of the most beautiful compensations of this life, that no man can sincerely try to help another without helping himself.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: We make a living by what we get, we make a life by what we give.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.quote: Those who bring sunshine to the lives of others cannot keep it from themselves.
quotes.author: Sir James Barrie
